pages_tested.title: Strata Noble - Transform Your Passion Into Profit

recommendations: Optimize About and Contact pages to reduce load times below 2.5 seconds
Implement proper form validation for all contact forms and newsletter signup
Add client-side caching to reduce loading states between page transitions
Consider implementing Progressive Web App (PWA) features for better mobile experience
Add proper error boundaries for better error handling
Implement lazy loading for heavy content sections
Add performance monitoring and Core Web Vitals tracking
Consider server-side rendering optimizations for slower pages

cross_browser_compatibility.note: Testing limited to curl requests - full browser testing with Playwright recommended
